sys_ux_client_script.name: New client script 1

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_c1e8d4b5c3152210e4d6b132b40131ee
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">f0d4c1b0c3512210e4d6b132b4013143</macroponent><name>New client script 1</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
// User-Agent des Browsers abrufen
    var userAgent = navigator.userAgent;

    // Überprüfen, ob der User-Agent auf ein Apple-Betriebssystem hinweist
    if (userAgent.indexOf("Macintosh") !== -1) {
        // Wenn es sich um einen Apple-Computer handelt, den Client State Parameter auf true setzen
        api.setState('isAppleDevice', true);
    } else {
        // Wenn es sich nicht um einen Apple-Computer handelt, den Client State Parameter auf false setzen
        api.setState('isAppleDevice', false);
    }
}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-05-04 13:04:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>c1e8d4b5c3152210e4d6b132b40131ee</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>New client script 1</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DeviceFinder" source="x_1639660_devicefi">b1a177cfc30d2e90e4d6b132b401315c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DeviceFinder">b1a177cfc30d2e90e4d6b132b401315c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_c1e8d4b5c3152210e4d6b132b40131ee</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-05-04 13:04:37</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
